医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究警告说，吃超加工食品会使您的肝脏面临风险这项研究发现，食用超加工食品 (UPF) 与非酒精性脂肪肝、肝硬化和严重肝脏疾病的风险增加之间存在显着联系。研究结果表明，减少 UPF 摄入量可能是增强肝脏健康和福祉的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Eating-ultra-processed-foods-puts-your-liver-at-risk-new-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Eating-ultra-processed-foods-puts-your-liver-at-risk-new-study-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f7db63b-5672-4f4c-b6b9-41a0e9816470 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:57:00 -0400 Eating ultra-processed foods puts your liver at risk, new study warns
COVID-19期间NF-κB的激活及其对高血压患者的影响研究人员回顾了 NF-κB 激活在 SARS-CoV-2 复制中的作用以及 COVID-19 药物对 NF-κB 激活的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/NF-cebaB-activation-during-COVID-19-and-its-impact-on-病人-with-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/NF-cebaB-activation-during-COVID-19-and-its-impact-on-病人-with-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e31fcddc-85af-461a-81fd-16de3a82c734 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:35:00 -0400 NF-κB activation during COVID-19 and its impact on patients with hypertension
研究挑战低出生体重与儿童神经发育问题之间的联系《美国医学会杂志精神病学》最近的一项研究使用孟德尔随机化来研究低出生体重与儿童神经发育问题之间的联系。研究发现，影响出生体重和后代神经发育的母体遗传因素之间没有因果关系，尽管一些证据表明胎儿遗传变异可能发挥有限的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-challenges-link- Between-low-birth-weight-and-childhood-neurodevelopmental-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-challenges-link- Between-low-birth-weight-and-childhood-neurodevelopmental-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cfb237b-4a6a-4aea-a16e-e3bb7e12f349 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:24:00 -0400 Study challenges link between low birth weight and childhood neurodevelopmental issues
研究揭示可卡因成瘾如何改变大脑的奖励系统罗格斯大学的研究人员利用神经影像学证明，可卡因成瘾会改变大脑的系统，以评估与我们的决定相关的各种结果的回报程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-sheds-light-on-how-cocaine-addiction-alters-brains-reward-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-sheds-light-on-how-cocaine-addiction-alters-brains-reward-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5262c9e-cc9c-42c7-8f56-5ae742fc3412 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:32:00 -0400 Study sheds light on how cocaine addiction alters brain's reward system
科学家发现精子活力的隐藏复杂性斯德哥尔摩大学的研究人员揭示了精子如何从被动的旁观者变成动态游泳者的隐藏复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Scientists-discover-hidden-intricacies-of-sperm-motility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Scientists-discover-hidden-intricacies-of-sperm-motility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bba1b953-0800-42ac-8ac9-5dcf34348e7c Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:27:38 -0400 Scientists discover hidden intricacies of sperm motility
研究：将糖尿病眼部筛查延长至两年可能会面临严重治疗延误和视力丧失的风险英国在线发表的一项大型真实世界数据研究表明，将英国糖尿病眼病（糖尿病视网膜病变）低风险人群的年度筛查延长一年可能会带来严重的治疗延误和/或视力丧失的风险眼科杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-Extending-diabetic-eye-screen-to-2-years-could-risk-ritic-treatment-delays-and-sight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-Extending-diabetic-eye-screen-to-2-years-could-risk-ritic-treatment-delays-and-sight-loss.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f380ac5d-329c-4fc2-8933-0e6bc0e47f82 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:22:02 -0400 Study: Extending diabetic eye screen to 2 years could risk critical treatment delays and sight loss
年轻人需要权衡网络性行为的好处和风险年轻人将互联网视为日常浪漫和性接触的自然平台，但与此同时，他们必须权衡各种风险和危险的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Young-people-need-to-weigh-up-the-benefits-against-risks-of- Sex-online-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Young-people-need-to-weigh-up-the-benefits-against-risks-of- Sex-online-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c3e61ec-ff86-41ea-babf-eb8ee55a7458 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:18:00 -0400
3D 建模揭示二叶式主动脉瓣患者 TAVR 期间球囊破裂的原因宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。经导管主动脉瓣置换术 (TAVR) 期间的球囊破裂是一种罕见但严重的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/3D-modeling-reveals-cause-of-balloon-rupture-during-TAVR-in-病人-with-bicuspid-aortic-valve.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/3D-modeling-reveals-cause-of-balloon-rupture-during-TAVR-in-病人-with-bicuspid-aortic-valve.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8227db3-fb21-4ac6-9e67-84c4b9211adc Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:15:40 -0400 3D modeling reveals cause of balloon rupture during TAVR in patients with bicuspid aortic valves
科学家在治疗“被忽视”的风湿性多肌痛方面取得突破科学家们发现，一种可以为患者提供类固醇替代品的药物可以成功治疗“被忽视”的炎症性疾病——风湿性多肌痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Scientists-achieve-breakthrough-in-treating-neglected-polymyalgia-rheumatica.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Scientists-achieve-breakthrough-in-treating-neglected-polymyalgia-rheumatica.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f289e10-091b-47d2-a096-1b32005e7520 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:05:16 -0400 Scientists achieve breakthrough in treating 'neglected' polymyalgia rheumatica
怀孕期间接触寨卡病毒会减慢胎儿生长并影响母婴互动加州大学戴维斯分校加州国家灵长类动物研究中心的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，怀孕的恒河猴感染寨卡病毒会减缓胎儿的生长，并影响婴儿和母亲在出生第一个月的互动方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Zika-virus-exposure-during-pregnancy-slows-fetal-growth-and-affects-mother-infant-interaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Zika-virus-exposure-during-pregnancy-slows-fetal-growth-and-affects-mother-infant-interaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed30167d-73b6-457b-841c-33f1dc290454 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:01:09 -0400 Zika virus exposure during pregnancy slows fetal growth and affects mother-infant interaction
